name: REVITALYZE-EXT
description:
Sleep the Fat Away*
Increase Nighttime Metabolism*
Reduce Late Nate Cravings*
Increase Stage 3 Sleep*

        REVITALIZE EXT contains key ingredients that generates superior fat utilization while you are sleeping and REVITALIZE  EXT also contains a cortisol blocker designed to reduce anxiety and help achieve stage 3 sleep. In addition, REVITALIZE EXT also contains exclusive blends which increases appetite suppression, boosts overall metabolism and helps stabilize thyroid functions for peak nighttime weight loss.* 

Warning:
 Do not drive or operate heavy equipment while taking this product. Do not exceed more than 3 capsules in a 24 hour period. If you suffer from asthma, insomnia, sleep apnea, are pregnant, nursing or taking any prescription medications, talk to your physician before taking this product. Do not use if tamper resistant seal is broken.

Suggested Use:
 Take 1-2 capsule at least 30 minutes before bedtime. To be used as part of a healthy diet and exercise plan.

description: Livergenix is an extremely potent liver protector. An addition to a liver protector, Livergenix also provides liver restoration. Do not cheat yourself with a low quality product, especially dealing with your liver. Livergenix is the ultimate in liver protection.

name: BACKNECLEANSE
description: Get rid of stubborn body acne.One of the most potent body cleansers on the market. Use daily to achieve results. Do not use on face.

name: DETOX-GMP
description:
*Weight Loss
*Bloating Relief
*Complete Cleanse
Each day your body is bombarded with toxins. They're in the food you eat, the beverages you drink, the air you breathe. Thankfully, your body is designed to automatically rid itself of many of these toxins. Your colon and gastro-intestinal tract are a vital part of your body's natural toxin elimination system. 
Unfortunately, years of exposure to a high fat, low fiber diet and taking prescription or over-the-counter medications can result in a build-up of toxic, impacted fecal matter inside the colon and gastro-intestinal tract. The average person has between 4 and 20 lbs of accumulated fecal matter, toxic fecal waste, collected in their colon and gastro-intestinal tract. This toxic fecal waste causes serious problems, including bloating, fast ageing, and disease.
DETOX-GMP helps support optimum health by safely removing the toxic build-up inside your colon and gastro-intestinal tract. This allows your body to detoxify itself, just like nature intended. Maintaining a healthy colon and gastro-intestinal tract leads to weight loss, a flattened waistline, healthy skin,  increase of energy, bloating relief, and regularity of bowel movements.

name: LAXOGENIN HERS
description:
The ultimate female weight loss and toning supplement. L-laxogenin, was discovered by a American scientist in 1996. It was shown to possess an anabolic/androgenic ratio similar to one of the most efficient anabolic substances, in particular Anavar but without the side effects of liver toxicity or testing positive for steroidal therapy. Athletes have found dramatic strength increases in 3-5 days, and muscle mass increases in 3-4 weeks. Muscle mass or fat loss is only a function of caloric intake. If you are a male that is a hard gainer or someone that is looking to put on extra lean muscle and most important, keep it. This is the ONLY product EVER designed to do this without steroidal influence. Product is great for drug testing and does not test positive for steroids. Tests showed that protein synthesis increased by over 200% , the key to lean muscle growth and accelerated repair. Body fat reduction is one of the key components of this molecule. When you restrict your calories you reduce body fat dramatically. In testing the molecule has balance cortisol response which is the major cornerstone to healthy recovery and reduction of muscle wasting.

This product may be taken for post surgical injury repair. It regenerates the healing process by 10 fold with most surgeries. It is currently being tested for internal fistula repair, shoulder repair, knee surgery and general anabolic regeneration issues related to aging.

Aging is now viewed as a disease state. The catabolic, or destruction of mature healthy cells has been a problem for science throughout mankind. This product is the closest product to repairing or regenerating cellular decline. What does this mean in plain English? Basically, it is the most important preventative, regenerative process in modern medicine. This is a plant sterol from plants. Its purpose in the plant kingdom is to insure survival in inclement conditions. It does the same in the human body. The blood of the plant is only 1 molecule apart from the blood of a human. Recent science has concluded that plant sterols for age related conditions, such as, DNA repair and regeneration, are some of the most dynamic in modern medicine.

Recommendations for use: For Men take 1-2 with breakfast and 1-2 with dinner. For Women take 1 capsule at breakfast and 1 capsule at dinner.Remember: More isn’t better. This act’s as a signaling agent. Not a steroid.
Recommended Test Panels:
MHP, Male Hormone Panel: Androgen Pathway
ASI for Male and Female: Adrenal Panel
FHP, Cycling Female Hormone Panel
PHP-2 PeriMenopausal Hormone Panel
PHP-1 Menopausal Hormone Panel

Testing:
Product is being currently tested for the reversal of the following diseases:

1.Osteopenia
2.Osteoporosis
3.Arthritis
4.Diabetes, all forms
5.Injury repair, all types
6.Knee injuries, specific
7.Shoulder injuries, specific
8.Children during adrenal development
9.Cancer, MS, Lupus etc..

Q & A
What are the two pathways through which Laxogenin works? RNA and Ribosome Assembly.

The literature given suggests that one pathway involves an increased rate in decoding RNA. But that's still too technical for me to fully grasp, and I can't find an explanation of the second pathway.

Basically, he is saying that by decoding RNA he is able to target the action of the molecular structure to stimulate a specific protein action. It is a catalyst for proper targeting function in the body. In this case, anabolic activity.

Example:
HGH therapy is a collection of 191 Amino Acids that are assembled and delivered by injection. If you take one step in reverse and figure out the sequencing equation of RNA, you can create the assembly and have the ribosomes create the assembly. The only thing you have to determine is how much to take to evoke the specified action. Which we did.

Messenger RNA tells the ribosome, a ribosome is a small, dense organelle in cells that assembles proteins and ribosomes build proteins from the genetic instructions held within a messenger RNA and assemble what kind of proteins to make and how much to crank out. They are basically the expediter.

What is your experience with female weight loss?

All of the Women that have tried this product say that they will never stop taking it. Better muscle tone, better & healthier appetite, better cellulite reduction and most important skin toning, smoothing effect.

What is your experience with male weight loss?

Remember, this product works synergistically with caloric intake. If you restrict your calorie intake and eat every 2.5 hours throughout the day and don’t miss your breakfast shake with Fiber and Fats for a complete meal, then you will lose fat without losing lean body mass! Most important and highly overlooked..

name: EXPLOSION
description:
Explosion: The most innovating pre work out formula available today. The combination of the most potent products available. A scientific pre workout mix that is like no other. Explosion's unique 3 step process
delivers a massive pump combined with enduring strength gains and fat
loss.. 

Explosion’s 3 step "Time Released Anabolic Pump":

Step one (Explosion NO Activator): Explosion's significant dosage of Tyrosine and Arginine will start to dilate blood vessels moving essential
nutrients to enter muscle tissue and increase energy levels.

Step two (Explosion Lean Mass Activator): Explosions powerful ingredient Tribulus Terrestris begins the increase in natural testosterone which can cause significant lean muscle mass growth without artificial testosterone boosters.

Step three (Explosion Longevity Activator): Explosions combination of CLA and Tribulus Terrestris proven to reduce body fat and preserve lean body mass. Explosion Longevity Activator affects two enzymes, one that breaks down fat from the cells and one that breaks down fat in the blood to maintain lean muscle mass also stimulating hormone levels.

name: PHENALEAN
description:
PHENALEAN Xtreme

*Xtreme Fat Incinerator
*Metabolsim Booster
*Energy Enhancer
*Lean Muscle Activator
PHENALEAN EXTREME our latest and most unique formula ever. We have created a formula that works the same as ephedra, but doesn't contain ephedra. This one of a kind blend of Cha De Bugre, Yohimbine HCI, Rooibos, South African Hoodia, and 14 other hand picked proven herbs that will have you getting great results previously achieved with ephedra. This product is made from the highest pharmaceutical quality dietary ingredients available. Every herb extract is standardized and certified for the highest precision potentcies.

name: ESTROFUSE
description:
ESTROFUSE is a very powerful all natural estrogen blocker. When you block estrogen, naturally your body will produce more natural testosterone. Excess estrogen can cause bloating and water retention. ESTROFUSE also includes powerful ingredients Indole-3-carbinol and DIM is one of the major anticancer substances found in cruciferous (cabbage family) vegetables. It is a member of the class of sulfur-containing chemicals called glucosinolates. It is formed from parent compounds whenever cruciferous vegetables are crushed or cooked.EstroCleanse is a powerful Phase 2 liver detoxifier removing harmful xynoestrogens, harmful estrogens circulating in the body from toxic exposure.

Indole-3-carbinol and DIM are antioxidants and potent stimulators of natural detoxifying enzymes in the body. Indole-3-carbinol, DIM and other glucosinolates are believed to be responsible for the lowered risk of cancer in humans.

*** STACK WITH LAXOGENIN FOR MAXIMUM RESULTS.

name: EFA XTREME
description:
Weight Loss:  being overweight is hard and losing weight and keeping it off is harder. Science shows that almost 100% of all people who are deficient in essential lipids are overweight. EFA Extreme helps you lose weight by using fat to burn fat, and by eliminating the pesky cravings that cause weight gain in the first place.
Powerful antioxidant:  oxidants can damage your muscles and organs and cripple your health. EFA Extreme fights harmful oxidants and protects you against oxidative damage.
Lowers cholesterol: high cholesterol is common and is a major health risk. High cholesterol increases your blood pressure and your chances of heart disease. Millions of people die from high-cholesterol induced by high blood pressure every year. EFA Extreme can help reduce your cholesterol levels and support a healthy blood pressure.
Increases hormone secretion: healthy hormone secretion is necessary to lose weight, for healthy skin, shiny hair and awesome moods. Your body uses essential lipids to make the hormones you need for good health. If you are deficient in essential lipids your body cannot make the hormones you need to be healthy and to enjoy a slim body, healthy skin, shiny hair and awesome moods. Essential lipids will support optimal hormone secretion.
Increases energy levels: EFA Extreme gives you energy by fueling your energy producing cells. Essential lipids are the cleanest energy source for these cells.
Strengthens immune system: EFA Extreme will strengthen your immune system and protect your body against harmful oxidants, help optimize your hormone secretion, increase your energy levels and lower your cholesterol. Combined, these effects dramatically strengthen your immune system against minor cold and flues as well as potentially serious health conditions.

EFA Extreme works because it contains a revolutionary  Lipid Complex that’s very powerful, effective and proven. Thousands of scientific studies have proven the power of the lipids in the EFA Extreme.
